Pre-Game Insights: Cleveland comes into a matchup with Brooklyn as winners of 10 straight games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland finished 48-34 overall and 31-21 in Eastern Conference play a season ago.
Brooklyn finished 32-50 overall and 24-28 in Eastern Conference action during the 2023-24 season.
Others: Cavaliers: Emoni Bates: out (knee), Max Strus: out (ankle).
Nets: Bojan Bogdanovic: out (foot), Day'Ron Sharpe: out (hamstring), Trendon Watford: out (hamstring).
